Text.Name: SuperPart_Chicken_1
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down from the bloodline of chicken Yaoguai that converges forces of Yang to the beak and grants it Force of Destruction. Uses it to attack with the beak and excels at penetrating Qi barriers.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.\n Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Chicken_2
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down from the bloodline of chicken Yaoguai that remolds the crown with the Force of the Sun. Once achieved, remolding will become very efficient.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's remold rate by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Chicken_3
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down from the bloodline of chicken Yaoguai, which originally comes from a tail feather remolded by the Peacock Sage following the ancient creed of the Five Elements. Once achieved, nothing can escape its brush.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance by a huge amount.
